meta.title: Characters
meta.description: Comprehensive records of all major figures in the world's history

primordial.title: Primordial Beings
primordial.description: The original entities whose existence shaped the fundamental forces of the world

the_seeker.title: The Seeker
the_seeker.content: The original being whose pain and subsequent suppression gave birth to both Storm and Void. Their journey through time was a quest to give meaning to suffering and find wholeness through helping others.
the_seeker.significance: The progenitor of the world's fundamental forces and the architect of its cyclical nature

the_storm.title: The Storm
the_storm.content: Born from the Seeker's unbearable pain, the Storm represents the raw, creative, and emotional aspects of existence. It manifests as both destructive chaos and transformative power.
the_storm.significance: The fundamental force of emotion, chaos, and creation

the_void.title: The Void
the_void.content: Emerged from the Seeker's attempt to suppress their pain, the Void represents order, control, and the absence of chaos. It manifests as both stabilizing force and oppressive stillness.
the_void.significance: The fundamental force of order, control, and stability

eternals.title: The Eternals
eternals.description: Ancient beings created to serve as guardians and guides through history

the_wanderer.title: The Wanderer
the_wanderer.content: An eternal created by the Ancients who chose to walk among mortals, observing and subtly guiding rather than enforcing order. Their wisdom comes from centuries of witnessing humanity's struggles and triumphs.
the_wanderer.significance: A bridge between the Ancient past and the present, guiding humanity toward balance

the_enchantress.title: The Enchantress
the_enchantress.content: An eternal who discovered the importance of emotional balance, choosing to protect and nurture rather than control. She represents the possibility of harmony between Storm and Void.
the_enchantress.significance: Living proof that control and emotion can coexist in harmony

shattering_era.title: The Shattering Era
shattering_era.description: The tragic figures whose actions led to the world-changing cataclysm

the_shatterer.title: The Shatterer
the_shatterer.content: Originally a subject of Ancient experiments in Storm energy control, he escaped and found peace as a farmer with his family. His grief and rage at their loss triggered the cataclysmic event known as the Shattering, transforming him into a fundamental force of nature.
the_shatterer.significance: The catalyst of the Shattering and progenitor of Storm wielders

the_veil.title: The Veil
the_veil.content: The Collective's most skilled agent, trained in perfect emotional suppression. Her mission to destroy the Shatterer became complicated by emerging emotions, leading to internal conflict that contributed to the Shattering. Her guilt and suppression became the foundation of Void energy.
the_veil.significance: The originator of Void manipulation and embodiment of its duality

sentinels.title: The Sentinels
sentinels.description: The mortal champions who ascended to become earth-walking gods

the_tinkerer.title: The Tinkerer
the_tinkerer.content: A brilliant inventor who learned to harness Storm energy through technology and understanding rather than raw power. Their ascension transformed them into a divine creator who uses Storm energy to protect and innovate.
the_tinkerer.significance: Demonstrates how Storm energy can be refined and controlled without suppression

the_survivor.title: The Survivor
the_survivor.content: Once left for dead, they were reborn through a Storm shard merging with their heart. Their ascension transformed them into a divine agent of change, working from the shadows to empower the oppressed.
the_survivor.significance: Shows how divine power can catalyze human-driven change

the_final_bladecaster.title: The Final Bladecaster
the_final_bladecaster.content: The last of the Bladecaster Order, wielding one of the few remaining shard-forged blades. Their ascension transformed them into a divine protector of balance between Storm and Void.
the_final_bladecaster.significance: Embodies the ideal of perfect harmony between chaos and order
